headline: VICI Properties (VICI) Margin Decline Undercuts Bullish Narrative Despite Low Valuation
summary: VICI Properties (VICI) posted net profit margins of 70.2%, down from 73.9% last year, showing a year-over-year dip in profitability. While earnings are projected to grow about 4.8% annually, that pace falls short of both the broader US market’s revenue growth rate of 10.4% and earnings growth rate of 15.9%. Shares are currently changing hands at $29.99, well below the company’s internal fair value estimate of $58.93. Its Price-To-Earnings ratio of 11.5x stands out as more attractive than both...

headline: VICI (VICI) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
summary: The release and supplemental information can be found in the Investors section of the VICI Properties website at www.viciproperties.com.  Ed and team will provide some opening remarks, and then we will open the call to questions.

headline: These REITs Could Outperform The Vanguard Real Estate ETF
summary: The Vanguard Real Estate Index Fund ETF Shares is commonly viewed as the benchmark for REITs. Check out three REIT stocks that we expect to crush VNQ.

headline: A Whirlwind Tour Through Major REIT Earnings Reports (And My Buy List)
summary: I'm cautious on oversupplied sectors like multifamily and life science, but bullish on select retail, infrastructure, and gaming REITs for long-term income. Read the full analysis here.
